rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66781

definition: Those units of time that are routinely used to express the age of a subject.
name: Age Unit

terms.definition: A unit of measurement of time equal to 24 hours.
A unit of measurement of time equal to 60 minutes.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks. (NCI)
Any period of seven consecutive days. (NCI)
The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period. (NCI)
